title: Graph of deriv, semicircles and segments part - b

content.description: Let f be a function defined on the closed interval −5 ≤ x ≤ 5 with f(1)=3. The graph of f' the derivative of f, consists of two semicircles and two line segments, as shown above.
content.question: For -5<x<5 find all values x at which the graph of f has a point of inflection. Justify your answer.

frqParts.text: For -5<x<5 find all values x at which the graph of f has a point of inflection. Justify your answer.

topic.text: 5.6: Determining Concavity of Functions over Their Domains

skill.text: Skill 2.E: Describe the relationships among different representations of functions and their derivatives.
